resume_snippet: SUMMARY: I have 33 years' experience in biotech including 27 years of managing staff and process (10 years of Senior Leadership). Expertise in developing, managing and maintaining Manufacturing/QA programs and systems to ensure employees produce Quality products for patients. Proven success motivating multiple groups to achieve objectives. Known for high energy, flexibility in working with diverse audiences, and upbeat approach. Exceeds client and company expectations consistently. CORE COMPETEN
